import React from 'react'; import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem, ListGroupItemHeading, ListGroupItemText } from 'reactstrap'; const Questions = () => { return ( What do I need to play? The Lottery DApp is a decentrailised application that lives on the Ethereum Network. From your browser, please download the plugin Metamask, that will enable you to access and play our game. Metamask is an Ethereum wallet.
You will need to transfer funds to them in order to take part in the Lottery. Where is the source code? The Lottery DApp source code can be found here List group item heading Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Maecenas sed diam eget risus varius blandit. ); } export default Questions;
